Next: align loyalty campaign factory/tests to is_active, add purchaser_id to beauty_gift_cards (or adjust factory/tests), ensure unique user emails in VendorApiTest factories, and set availability/test data so booking service doesnâ€™t reject slots; rerun phpunit.
